data.text: “In Ayub, luong ane ka bende nitiere ngʼama nyalo dwoki?
Ich wangʼ nego ngʼama ofuwo,
An awuon aseneno ngʼama ofuwo ka odak e ngima maber,
Nyithinde ok nyal yudo konyruok
Joma kech oloyo chamo chamb ngʼat mofuwono,
Nikech richo ok honre ahona kayiem,
To dhano inywolo ei chandruok,
“Dine bed ni an in, to dine atero ywakna ne Nyasaye;
Otimo gik madongo miwuoro ma rieko dhano ok chopie
Omiyo koth chue e piny;
Joma ni piny otingʼo malo,
Oketho chenro mar joma paro timo timbe mamono
Omako joma riek gi riekogi giwegi,
Piny othonegi mudho kata mana ka chiengʼ rieny,
Oreso joma odhier e dho tho;
Omiyo joma odhier bedo gi geno,
“En jahawi ngʼat ma Nyasaye kwero,
Nimar kokecho kodi mochwadi
Enoresi ka in e masiche mar auchiel; to adier,
Ka dera omako piny, to obiro resi e tho,
Enopandi kuom dhok makwongʼi,
Inibed mamor ka masira gi kech nitie
Nikech initim winjruok gi kite manie lowo,
Iningʼe ni hembi oriti maber;
Inibed kingʼeyo ni nyithindi nobed mangʼeny,
Inidag amingʼa mitho kapod itegno,
“Wasenono wachni, mwanwangʼo ni en adier.
